reviews.review:
Despite some big systematic flaws with the game, such as basement, face camping killers, t-bagging survivors, and a broken MMR system, it's one of the best games that I have ever played. For hundreds of hours, I and my friends have enjoyed the wide variety of maps, killers, and survivor builds that can be made an combined.

9/10 recommend
gameplay sympa, je ne m'en lasse pas avec mes amis comme en solo
Its fun and addicting. Makes you anxious but thats the fun part. Cool to see infamous killers in the game like Freddy, Michael Myers, Leatherface, pin head etc.
a pesar de ter problemas com o rankeamento ja que sou iniciante no jogo e como killer tem vezes que caio contra times de surv de rank altissimo mesmo sendo cinza,o jogo √© muito divertido
buen juego hasta que todos los survs empiezan a usar linterna.

ce jeu de catin alors alors alors...je vais m'adresser a vous
LES JOUEURS TOXIC FOUT CASSER LES BOULES JE VOUS JURE JE VAIS VOUS FAIRE BOUFFER VOTRE ARME ET VOUS ALLER GERBER VOS TRIPES 
voila merci et arrete de camper et focus bg ;)

I love the idea of playing DBD, I hate the actual experience. The devs are deaf to the community and keep making the game worse.
Currently playing killer is absolutely miserable, playing survivor is fine.


Let's just hope VHS will be actual competition to DBD so the devs have to actually try to make the game better.
The least fun, most stress inducing game that you will want to play everyday. 10/10
need more games in this genre tbh waiting for new escape ways like in friday 13.

Pretty fun game. I recommend this game if you like horror purely because the sheer amount of franchises in this game. 
Though, the community can be a bit toxic from time to time, but this game has been one of the funnest experiences I've had in a while.
game is very ok. very cool game indeed :)
This game is good , there are many types of killers and survivors to play. Even though some killers or survivors play like shittt
